reviews_data.review_text: Small, but the space is well-used, section for teens, and a section for kids, and also some art.  It seems it is a well-used location, based on the number of people using the facility for computer access and printing.  It seems older than other facilities.  Parking is good for the size of the location.
Great selection! Always nice staff and easy to find things.
The library was my mobile office today and between the copier and free computer usage, I got a lot done.
Very helpful, useful, and quite a great area! Wasy first time there and would highly recommend there if you looking for a good place to get work done and research!

I love this library. I love the area. Always have. I've been in Charlotte for a little over 30 years now, even before this library opened & I've always loved the area before that. I started using this one again about two years ago when I figured this one was easiest for me to get to even though Independence Regional is closer (I don't drive right now. Plus, I like hanging out at the Harris Teeter across the street). The librarians are always nice & helpful when I need to ask a question. Easy for me to find what I need because it's not a huge library but still enough space to be comfortable, even during this tough time we're in. Plaza Midwood and Independence Regional are both favorites for me.
Very quiet and helpful assistance from the staff
The staff was very helpful. I was able to get copies completed and printed.
I enjoy visiting this library very much.
Beautiful, open library space with caring, helpful staff.
Love this library. Staff is extremely friendly and helpful
Kind and knowledgeable librarians. Great selection of books and media.

Idk how you could give this place anything but 5 stars! Free books? Free Internet? A ton of free educational resources? Free Streaming library? This place has it all! I guess our taxes technically pay for this, but hey its one of the few government services that is useful and beneficial to everyone. This location is clean, friendly and comfortable on a hot day, couldn't ask for anything else!  Come on down and get a card!
Very organized. There are so many books! There are great YA, children's, and graphic novel sections. There are also DVDs and CDs. Everyone is super friendly.
Very friendly, and informative staff!

The librarians are very helpful and amazing. They give the kids free ice cream For like wendys As a reward for reading books. Summer reading program is free to sign up for and they help the little ones enjoy reading! Highly recommend this program while the kids are out. They also do reading sessions via zoom. My son love it!! Before civic the would throw pizza pajama parties and the kids would have on cute little costumes and pajamas. I miss that.
Absolutely love it

This is the friendliest library branch in all of Charlotte! Despite the limitations that Covid has placed on library visits, the staff is extremely helpful over the phone and is willing to accommodate for book pick ups and reservations for all.  The online account portal makes it very easy to reserve a book online.
The children's area is great. The building is clean and well maintained. The staff is always friendly

How can u focus when someone infront if you is eating something so smell and u move to computer and the next person is smacking and crunching soooo loud in food you can't concentrate this is a library not a cafeteria.....

This is a great place to go if you do not have the intranet.  You can just go in here plug in and get your work done.  This library can get a bit busy at times but all around it really feels nice.  This is really a good library.

Good space. Came here on a summer Tuesday at noon. I would like to come back when it is not busy hours. However, is appears there is only one floor and one room for everyone. Many kids screaming and crying and there appears to be a homeless man sleeping at one of the desks. Would be nice if there were separate rooms or floors; one for people who need quiet and another for those who plan to talk, have kids, and want to browse book/music selections

Nice staff, nice location, plenty space to study, small but efficient. I'm giving 1 start just to try to catch attention and see if they can do something about what shocked me on my last visit. I usually visit this location in mornings, very clean and comfortable, I went the other afternoon and the first thing I saw wrong was PEOPLE SMOKING JUST IN FRONT THE DOOR, libraries usually has certain smoke areas, a "no smoking" sign next to the door would be great, I'm asthmatic, coming out from library and breathe it make me very sick. I saw a cotckrarch the other morning, and then I figured out why, they allowed you to eat, no small snacks and soft drinks with caps to keep your drink safe of split it, they allowed fast food, which is very nasty seeing grease fingers prints on the tables and keyboards, plus all those fast food smells mix in the air, people eating like if they are actually in the fast food place, impossible to concentrate, come on, is a library not a mall or park. Finally, in the restroom we saw a small empty liquor bottle and a used razor, that's dangerous.

This library has the most annoying visitors that make it nearly impossible to study. Both times I've been the same guy is sitting at the same table playing chess by himself with a portable CD player with the headphones blasting all while he is crunching on chips and talking phones calls like this is his office. Seems like staff would try and eliminate this nuisance.
It's very spacious and clean and the staffs are nice and helpful.
Good chapter books, very helpful librarians, amazing help, very nice people, nice place to do homework, and a good place to calm down. :D
Nice library been going here for years
We love this branch!
Love this library and the staffs are very friendly, and helpful.
The lady at the front desk was very helpful! Getting a library card was easy. Thank you!
Smaller branch but everyone is pretty friendly... New paint job that is super cute. In the heart of Plaza midwood. Great area and there is ALWAYS something to do!
I love this library. Great location and very helpful librarians.

I love this library, and am so grateful that it's still here! I have become a huge fan of searching for my books online and having them reserved for me. So convenient! Doesn't take long at all to have books sent from other locations as well.

Small library. Plenty of computers for adults, and friendly staff. Children's section: Small but efficient. Small DVD section. Book area is small but the selection is good Baby wooden puzzled Large floor puzzles Baby/ toddler flash cards Small Wooden block bead toys Play fruit Soft building blocks Couch Love seat Three arm chairs
It aswome
